name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle
display_help: Your weapon of choice is a high tech beam rifle capable of firing a wide variety of energy blasts at your foes. Your Beam Rifle attacks will have greater potency while Disintegration is in effect on your target. Additionally, single target Beam Rifle attacks used on targets suffering from the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread this effect to nearby foes. Beam Rifle focuses on dealing a great deal of single target damage, but has a few area of effect attacks as well.

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Single_Shot
powers.display_help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle which deals Moderate Energy damage and has a chance to knock the target down. If the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect, Single Shot will reduce the target's regeneration rate slightly. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

display_info: 20.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
20.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
6.60% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 8.5s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Charged_Shot
powers.display_help: By charging up your Beam Rifle, you're able to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe to cause High Energy damage. The impact strikes with such force that it can knock your target off of their feet. Charge Shot causes additional damage if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

display_info: 25.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
25.00% chance for 0.7 magnitude knock on target
11.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.17s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Cutting_Beam
powers.display_help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon and sweep it in a broad arc blasting all foes in a wide cone in front of you. Cutting beam deals Moderate Energy damage and reduces the targets' Defense. This power will cause Minor Energy damage over time if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 57.49 energy damage on target after 0.5s delay
66.88 energy damage on target after 0.5s delay
3 ticks of 6.32 energy damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 7.35 energy damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay
5.10% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.4s on self
-7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Disintegrate
powers.display_help: You fire a stream of energy at your foe which causes them to slowly disintegrate and suffer High Energy damage over time. Even after the damage over time effect wears off the target will have their regeneration rate reduced and suffer from the Disintegration effect for an additional period of time. Using Beam Rifle powers on targets affected by Disintegrate will inflict additional effects. Additionally if Single Shot, Charged Shot, Lancer Shot and Penetrating Ray are used on a target suffering from Disintegrating, they have a chance to cause this effect to spread to up 3 nearby targets that aren't already suffering from Disintegrating. Targets affected by this Disintegrate Spread will also suffer some Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 10 ticks of 13.51 energy damage over 10.5s on target
10 ticks of 18.02 energy damage over 10.5s on target
12.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.4s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 62.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Lancer_Shot
powers.display_help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy at a nearby foe that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from the Disintegrating effect. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect have a chance to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegration effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 12.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.4s on self

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Penetrating_Ray
powers.display_help: You take careful aim at your target and deliver a punishing supercharged shot from your Beam Rifle. This causes Extreme Energy damage and may knock the target off their feet. If the target is also suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will also suffer additional damage over time. Like all Sniper attacks it will be interrupted if you're attacked. In addition, targets already affected by the Disintegrating effect will cause this effect to spread to 3 nearby targets. This Disintegrate Spread effect can only hit targets that aren't already affected by the Disintegrating effect. Disintegrate Spread causes Minor Energy damage over time. If you are engaged in battle this attack becomes instant-cast. If you are not engaged, it will do bonus damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Sniper, Extreme Dmg(Energy), Self +Range, Foe Knockdown, Special

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Piercing_Beam
powers.display_help: You release a supercharged beam in a narrow cone of energy that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Piercing Beam deals High Energy damage and briefly reduces their damage resistance. If a target struck by Piercing Beam is suffering from the Disintegrating effect it will immediately suffer additional damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Narrow Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), Foes -Res, Special

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 80 ft. radius 5° arc (3 targets max)

display_info: 12.80% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 9.83s on self
-13.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on target

powers.name: Blaster_Ranged.Beam_Rifle.Overcharge
powers.display_help: You overcharge your Beam Rifle and release a massive blast of energy at a group of distant foes causing Extreme Energy damage, causing Minor Energy damage over time, reducing the defense of all affected foes and potentially stunning affected foes. If Overcharge strikes a target suffering from the Disintegrating effect they will be affected by a longer stun. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe Minor DoT (Energy), -Def(All), Disorient, Special
